name: UNO2072, UNO2081 Verify that the notifications and Alerts are working as expected.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with approve booking permissions.
When :
  • A booking is set to approved.
Then :
  • An email notification is sent to  user with authorization permissions so that the booking can be actioned.

name: Verify that a Neuven User can access the Agency Workers Page.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User 
When :
  •  User has permissions to view agency>  agency workers page
Then :
  • Page is visible in the side menu
  • Page opens when selected .

name: Verify that the Neuven user can select and agency from the dropdown list on the Agency Workers Page.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • User can select any of the agencies from the drop down on the top of the page.
  • One the agency has been selected the table in the second part  of the screen will populate.
  • Check that that list is only showing the works that are assigned to that agency.

name: Verify that a Neuven User can search the advanced generic search file for the workers full name.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Using the generic advanced search option, the table should filter for the users fill name.

name: Verify that a Neuven User can search the advanced generic search file for the NI number of a worker.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Using the generic advanced search option, the table should filter for the users NI Number .

name: Verify that a Neuven User can search the advanced generic search file for the DOB of a worker.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Using the generic advanced search option, the table should filter for the users DOB .

name: Verify that a Neuven User can search the advanced generic search file for the email address of a worker.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Using the generic advanced search option, the table should filter for the users email address .

name: Verify the the User can not search for information not linked to the agency already selected.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with view agency workers permissions
When :
  • On the agency worker page 
  • Selecting the agency A1 
Then :
  • Search in the generic advanced search box for A2 and nothing should show up.

name: Verify that the show 'X ' entries drop down on the page displays and filter correctly.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with view agency works permission.
When :
  • Selecting a number from the selection of : '10' ,'25' ,'50','100'.
Then :
  • The page displays the correct number of rows in the table.

name: Verify that the Export button exports all the columns currently displays on screen.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with view agency works permissions
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Select a agency
  • Click on the export button 
  • The file is exported 
  • Open the file and cross check the column name with the ones displaying on the screen.

name: Verify that the Export button exports all the rows currently displays on screen.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a user with view agency works permissions
When :
  • On the agency workers page.
Then :
  • Select a agency
  • Filter the results using the advanced search option. 
  • Click on the export button 
  • The file is exported 
  • Open the file and cross check the data in the row with what is displaying on the screen.

name: Verify that the 'Previous' and 'Next' navigation buttons work.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user with view agency works permission. 
When :
  • Selecting show 'XX' numbers of entries to be displayed in the table. 
Then :
  • Using the 'previous ' and 'next' button work and navigate through the list on entries.

name: Verify that there is a new tab called legal information on the when editing a agency branch.
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
Then :
  • Select an agency from the drop down
  • Click expand and then click edit.
  • The agency details display a a tab called legal information.

name: Verify that there is a new tab called legal information on the when creating an agency branch.
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
Then :
  • Select 'Create new agency branch.
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.

name: Verify that the legal information screen has two credit score fields when creating a new agency.
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
  • Select 'Create an new agency Branch; 
Then :
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.
  • In the legal information tab there is a field for the current credit score of the agency . 
  • in the legal information tab there is also a field showing when the credit score was last checked.

name: Verify that the legal information screen has two credit score fields when Editing an agency branch
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
  • Select an agency from the drop down
  • Click expand and then click edit.
Then :
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.
  • In the legal information tab there is a field for the current credit score of the agency . 
  • in the legal information tab there is also a field showing when the credit score was last checked.

name: Verify that the legal information screen has the Company Status field when Editing an agency branch

testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
  • Select an agency from the drop down
  • Click expand and then click edit.
Then :
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.
  • In the legal information tab there is a field for Company Status.

name: Verify that the legal information screen has a Date of next due diligence check field when creating an agency branch

testScript:

When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
  • Select 'Create an new agency Branch'.
Then :
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.
  • In the legal information tab there is a field for the Date of next due diligence check .

name: Verify that the legal information screen has a field for Date of next due diligence check when creating an agency branch
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with agency permissions
When :
  • Go to agency > agency set up. 
  • Select 'Create an new agency Branch'.
Then :
  • The agency details display  a tab called legal information.
  • In the legal information tab there is a field  for the Date of next due diligence check .

name: Verify that the legal information screen has the Company Status field when Editing an agency branch (cloned)
folder: UNO-1872 Neuven User - Agency - Update Existing Agency Branch
testScript:
